gui.config.gameRestartRequired: One or more changed settings requires that Minecraft be restarted before taking effect.
gui.config.tooltip.applyGlobally: Apply Undo Changes or Reset to Default globally.
gui.config.tooltip.resetAll: Reset All to Default. If the Apply globally checkbox is checked values on child screens will also be reset.
gui.config.tooltip.undoAll: Undo All Changes. If the Apply globally checkbox is checked changes to child screens will also be undone.
